=== Generic CLR Type Substitution Tests ===

--- Test 1: Box<int>.value ---
intBox.label = int box
intBox.value = 42
doubled = 84

--- Test 2: Box<long>.value ---
longBox.label = long box
longBox.value = 9999999999
doubled = 19999999998

--- Test 3: Generic function ---
getBoxValue(intBox) = 42
doubled = 84

--- Test 4: Arithmetic on generic value ---
intValue + 10 = 52
intValue * 3 = 126

--- Test 5: Direct property access ---
createIntBox(100, 'direct').value = 100
doubled = 200

=== All tests completed ===
